name: Odoru? Pokémon Ongakutai
summary: Odoru? Pokémon Ongakutai is a rhythm game made to promote the short film Pikachu and the Pokémon Band. The player must tap buttons on the screen in time with falling musical notes, as a Pokémon of their choice dances in the foreground. Racking up a combo will reward the player with bonus time, during which a score multiplier and backup Pokémon dancers appear. Additional Pokémon species may be unlocked as the game is played.
